english_example_sentence: If you don't place the fresh flowers on the table, they'll wilt quickly.
russian_example_sentence: Если ты не поставишь свежие цветы на стол, они быстро завянут.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen taze çiçekleri masaya koymazsan, hızla solacak.
